title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare Act 

2013(Application to specified diseases) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited animal health welfare act 2013(application specified diseases) order 2022

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 2. The provisions of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 apply to
text_raw:
2. The provisions of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 apply to 

each disease specified in the Schedule.
text_norm: 2 provision animal health welfare act 2013 apply disease specified schedule

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 3. The Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 (Application to specified
text_raw:
3. The Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 (Application to specified 

diseases) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 516 of 2020) is revoked. 

Schedule
text_norm: 3 animal health welfare act 2013 (application specified diseases) order 2020 (s.i no 516 2020) revoked schedule

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: Tuberculosis in animals other than ruminants.
